item.title: Clean code notes
item.description: Names Meaningful names increase readability. Names that communicate intent increase readability Functions DO’s: Function should do 1 thing. If a function is too big, it should be extracted into a class. few arguments as possible (no more than 3) DONT’s do not pass boolean as an argument do not use output argument, use return statement do not do defensive programming (check for null) Command - Query separation Function should either do something or return something not both.
